title: Opteka SP-10W Universal 10-WATT Triple-Panel Rapid Solar Charger with 2 USB Ports for 47st Photo Kindle Fire, Fire HD, Paperwhite, & Ink Tablets
features: Rapid Charging Panels for all Smartphones, Tablets & Most USB Devices
Bungee Loops to attach to your backpack for continuous charging while hiking, etc
description: Using the power of three rapid charging solar panels, the

is your new best friend when you're far from home. Travel with ease using the charger's bungee loops which attach to your backpack. Unfold the device and expose the 10 watt mono-crystalline solar panel, each section putting out approximately 600mA under strong sunlight. Dual USB charging ports allow up to two devices to recharge at once at a maximum output current of 2 Amps. No matter where you go, the Opteka Triple Panel Solar Charger will be ready for you.  *Note: The SP-10W does not include any connecting cables. You will need to use the USB cable that came with your device
